Header.name: Kochapas Santibut (Allen)
Header.title: Full-Stack Developer
Header.description: Experienced coder proficient in multiple programming languages since 2014.
Header.subDescription: Originally from Bangkok, Thailand. Seeking opportunities to utilize my skills and expertise to enhance quality of life and promote workplace efficiency.

tasks.1: Developed web applications on the Shopify platform utilizing Node.js for the backend and React.js for the frontend.
tasks.2: Designed and maintained databases using GraphQL and PostgresQL.
tasks.3: Helped to train and onboard new employees.
tasks.4: Conducted code reviews and provided feedback to other team members to ensure code quality and consistency.
tasks.5: Conduct analysis and offer insights on the company's applications to enhance efficiency, as well as strategize the timeline for implementing improvements.
